text: atahpara tomadera ki hala ye, munaphikadera samparke tomara duâ€™dala haye gele? Athaca allaha taâ€™ala taderake ghuriye diyechena tadera manda kajera karane! Tomara ki taderake patha pradarsana karate ca'o, yaderake allaha pathabhrasta karechena? Allaha yake pathabhranta karena, tumi tara jan'ya kona patha pabe na.
